divs: Sighting DetailsI was bringing my grandmother to work around 5:50AM in the morning like i do every day,but this day was special, while i was driving i noticed a very bright light in the sky, bouncing and moving back and forth, i knew this was not a helicoptor, or plane. After dropping my GM off, i drove quickly back to the site to see if it was still there and it was, so i parked my car for about 5 min watching and waiting. i turned my lights off cause at the time i figured they could see me watching. I watched it bounce all the way down the street and the it came back,shortly after a real plain came passing by, very smooth and slow,wings, and windows very visible to me, the ufo was about 50 feet above the plain, i dont know how they did not see this event, after the plain passed it the bounced in the air, down the street and back , after realizing what i seen i quickly went home and told my parents
Summary: I watch a very bright light hover in the air, moving up & down, left & right, shortly after I seen a real plane, and it went by very visibly.
